name: Before The Great (Finality)
description:
Before the Great is a turn based rpg that has you taking the role of a soldier in the army of the infamous former world ruler Garland, a week before his final assault on the capital of the continent of Jira. Before the Great is a remake/reimagining of "Before the Great Beyond" that has the player exploring the traveling town that followed Garland's march across Jira and meeting certain characters, training in turn based combat, and more. There are separate endings based on your actions and replaying the game with certain names will result in completely separate paths and allies.

Originally released on October 29th 2019
